EmailTemplate.name: 03 – Research summary
EmailTemplate.subject: About our research process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Nice talking to you again. If you haven’t already visited our web site, it’s a great resource for all things Five Star Professional, including detailed information about our research process.
To receive the Five Star award, a {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} must be nominated and must satisfy five objective eligibility and evaluation criteria that are associated with {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s who provide quality services to their clients. No more than 7 percent of the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Market_City__c} area were named 2013 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s.
You can go to the Research section of our web site to learn more. Let me know if I can provide any more information.
www.fivestarprofessional.com/2013/research.php
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2117 Cliff Drive Eagan, MN 55122 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
Award candidates and award winners: Please tell us about your experience with Five Star Professional. http://fivestar.98d1e644fe2e.sgizmo.com/s3/
